about_the_game: The demo for Net King’s Call, a fusion of both Turn-Based Strategy and Real Time Battles! Set in a future where the internet has become a world parallel to our own, different people and factions fight for control of the digital space. In this demo you'll play the first mission of the campaign, introducing you to some of our main characters and the basic game mechanics you can expect to see in the full game. Can you make it out of the ambush?
detailed_description: The demo for Net King’s Call, a fusion of both Turn-Based Strategy and Real Time Battles! Set in a future where the internet has become a world parallel to our own, different people and factions fight for control of the digital space. In this demo you'll play the first mission of the campaign, introducing you to some of our main characters and the basic game mechanics you can expect to see in the full game. Can you make it out of the ambush?

name: Net King's Call Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: External Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+ / AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: External Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
